titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

body.p: Mr Harry Grylls brought the plan of the window which Lady Bartley proposes to place in the window of the Tower. I approved it with a reservation as to the colouring.
Harold and Elsie came to lunch.
I completed arrangements for our tour tomorrow. Ella arrived about 4 p.m: & we decided to pack tonight & get off by the 9 a.m. from Charing Cross tomorrow.
